sent.orig: Tray stacking tray of the box should not exceed the limit locations.
sent.trans: 托盘上堆垛的包装箱不得超出托盘位置。

sent.orig: A twolayer tray feed mechanism accomplishes the tray feed in turn pneumatically.
sent.trans: 双层秧盘供送机构通过气动实现秧盘依次供送。

sent.orig: Create an unlimited number of tray icons and organize your Active Tray items into cascading menus.
sent.trans: 创建无限数量的托盘图标和组织您的积极托盘项目进入级联菜单。

sent.orig: Tray type cable tray is widely used in petroleum, chemicals, power, light industry, TV, telecommunication, etc.
sent.trans: 托盘式电缆桥架是石油、化工、电力、轻工、电视、电讯等方面应用最广泛的一种。

sent.orig: Structure and operating performance of new fixed valve tray with suspending downcomer (DJ-5 tray) was introduced.
sent.trans: 新型固定阀悬挂降液管塔板是一种新型大通量高效DJ塔板。
